headline: Gallagher Study Reveals Employers Investing in Holistic Wellbeing for Future Growth
summary: In response to macro uncertainty and rising costs, employers are increasingly prioritizing comprehensive wellbeing strategies to meet the evolving needs of their workforce. Gallagher's 2025 U.S. Benefits Benchmarks Report highlights a growing trend among employers to adopt holistic approaches that encompass physical, emotional, career and financial health.
